rows.label: Class000_Caption
rows.name:
The class you start out with.
Offers a balanced variety of Arts,
but provides no stat bonuses.

rows.label: Class001_Caption
rows.name:
Choose this route if you want to go in guns
blazing. Mixes offensive and defensive Arts,
and provides HP and melee-attack bonuses.
Well balanced and suited for beginners.

rows.label: Class002_Caption
rows.name:
The standard progression from Striker.
Retains the mix of offensive and defensive Arts
and the bonuses to HP and melee attack.
Well balanced and suited for beginners.

rows.label: Class003_Caption
rows.name:
An advanced Samurai Gunner. Shifts the focus
more toward offense. Provides bonuses to HP
and melee attack. 
[ST:col p1=green ]Reach Rank 10 to master this class's weapons.

rows.label: Class051_Caption
rows.name:
An alternate progression from Striker with
new weapons and a focus on defense.
Greatly improves HP and melee attack.

rows.label: Class052_Caption
rows.name:
An advanced Shield Trooper that increases
attribute resistance in addition to defense.
Greatly improves HP and melee attack.
[ST:col p1=green ]Reach Rank 10 to master this class's weapons.

rows.label: Class101_Caption
rows.name:
Choose this route if you want to rack
up damage. Focuses on skillful application of
damage buffs, and provides bonuses to melee
accuracy, ranged accuracy, and evasion.

rows.label: Class102_Caption
rows.name:
The standard progression from Commando.
Improves your damage-dealing capabilities
and retains the bonuses to melee accuracy,
ranged accuracy, and evasion.

rows.label: Class103_Caption
rows.name:
An advanced Winged Viper that features tricky
offensive Arts and offers bonuses to melee
accuracy, ranged accuracy, and evasion.
[ST:col p1=green ]Reach Rank 10 to master this class's weapons.

rows.label: Class151_Caption
rows.name:
An alternate progression from Commando with
new weapons and an emphasis on ranged
attacks. Provides bonuses to ranged attack
and accuracy.

rows.label: Class152_Caption
rows.name:
An advanced Partisan Eagle that continues
to be centered on ranged attacks and provide
bonuses to ranged attack and accuracy.
[ST:col p1=green ]Reach Rank 10 to master this class's weapons.

rows.label: Class201_Caption
rows.name:
Choose this route if you want to provide
support from afar. Offers many ranged Arts
and bonuses to ranged attack and potential.
Tricky to master and suited for professionals.

rows.label: Class202_Caption
rows.name:
The standard progression from Enforcer.
Weaken the enemy using debuffs and gain
bonuses to ranged attack and potential.
Tricky to master and suited for professionals.

rows.label: Class203_Caption
rows.name:
An advanced Psycorruptor that adds ally
support Arts to the mix of enemy debuffs.
Improves ranged attack and potential.
[ST:col p1=green ]Reach Rank 10 to master this class's weapons.

rows.label: Class251_Caption
rows.name:
An alternate progression from Enforcer with
new weapons and a balanced offense and
defense. Provides bonuses to both melee and
ranged attack.

rows.label: Class252_Caption
rows.name:
An advanced Blast Fencer that adds recovery
Arts to its even mix of offense and defense.
Improves melee and ranged attack.
[ST:col p1=green ]Reach Rank 10 to master this class's weapons.
